name: Power Trip- Armageddon Blues 12" PRE-ORDER
description:
so after about 3 years of talking about doing this release, we finally got our butts in gear and made it happen. This 1 sided 12" features all 6 tracks recorded by PT when they recorded the Armageddon Blues 7". the AB 7" was only pressed to 500 copies and they were sold out way too quickly. Here's your chance to save some bucks on eBay. Again, these are one sided with a badass Etching on the B-Side of the LP. New layout, new design, very cool shit. 3 Colors are available for purchase and are at a first come, first serve basis. 

AS ALWAYS, ALL ORDERS FROM OUTSIDE OF THE UNITED STATES MUST ORDER AT LEAST 2 ITEMS FROM THE WEBSTORE! THANK YOU! 

Tracklisting: 
1. Armageddon Blues
2. Lake Of Fire
3. The Evil Beat
4. Acid
5. Questions
6. Vultures

decided to print these suckers up. Black shirts, PT on the front, BBB on the back. AAA shirts. sizes Small-XXL available. These will only be printed once. They are NOT currently in stock but will be here at the same time as the Power Trip LP's.
